text: Igor Aleksandrovich Volkov (; born 23 August 1971) is a former Uzbekistani football player. ==External links== * Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Soviet footballers Category:Uzbekistani footballers Category:Uzbekistani expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Russia Category:Expatriate footballers in Belarus Category:Russian Premier League players Category:FC Nasaf players Category:Pakhtakor Tashkent FK players Category:FK Neftchi Farg'ona players Category:FC Torpedo Moscow players Category:FC Yenisey Krasnoyarsk players Category:FC Dynamo Stavropol players Category:FC Dnepr Mogilev players Category:Association football midfielders Category:Uzbekistani expatriate sportspeople in Belarus Category:Uzbekistani expatriate sportspeople in Russia
title: Igor Volkov (Uzbekistani footballer)
